text:
I choose to
speak about a documentary. Is not an invention but i think this one can be
change our vision of media. The documentary is called "Les nouveaux chiens
de garde". It's make by Alex Dupont and Alex Dupont in 2012. It's
based on a book, "Les Nouveaux Chiens de garde" by Alex Dupont and
this one is based on a book of Alex Dupont "Les chiens de garde",
published in 1932.
This three
works talk about the same things. Independance, objectivity and plurality of
media. This three rules is a gadge of credibility and legitimity of media. But
with the documentary we can understand that goal are not realist. Indeed,
"Les nouveaux chiens de garde" explain that journalist and politics
are friends, they come from a same school and a same world. So we can
questoning objectivity of journalist.
For
independance it's same. The documentary shows that media are control by very
big business. And logically, the journalist don't speak about some subject that
can be give a bad image of their boss.
We can
learned in this film that, yes we have access at few differents programs in tv
or internet but this programs are control by a same persons so a plurality is
not very respected.
For conclure, "Les nouveaux chien de garde" is in
my opinion a very important documentray. I think all the people should see this one for take conscience that ear
media is important for open minded at the world but it not forgetten to
questoning the media tell us. We should comparating different source, not
believe an information without know source. The documentary is necessary for
take distance with media without canceld however.
